description: Joshua is a Brown, black and white tiger striped neutered male cat, about ten years old.  He came with a cat named Rachel, whom we believe is his litter mate and sister.  He is a friendly, outgoing cat, who likes to talk.  His sister is a little more reserved.  In a large shelter, he was neutral, but allowed petting and being picked up.  In a quieter setting, he is quite friendly and interactive.  He has made good progress on becoming a trimmer cat.  He was rated overweight, but now is a healthy weight.  Sine these two cats know each other (and also know Michelle, from the same home), they might be a good choice for someone wanting to adopt two cats together.  To adopt Joshua and/or Rachel or Michelle, call 347 244-2377.
name: Joshua

description: Maily is a 10 year old female gray and white spayed female cat.  She was originally picked up as a stray.  She is a very pretty cat.  She is calm, relaxed and friendly.  She likes to sit on your lap to be cuddled, but sometimes likes to get down and go exploring.  She solicits attention and likes to rub against you.  She plays gently with toys.  She is suitable for a "beginner" home that has not had a cat before.
name: Maily

description: Oreo is a 7 year old neutered male domestic short hair cat.  Oreo is owner surrendered and somewhat independent.  He is his own cat and not easily enticed to come to you.  He is recommended to be placed with experienced cat owners and no small children.  To adopt Oreo, call 347-244-2477.
name: Oreo

description: WATCH MY VIDEO: http://youtu.be/felv_v_J7Yk Meet Bideawees leading lady, Ms. Tuna! Ms. Tuna is a very cute silver tabby that has a unique personality to match her distinctive name. Ms. Tuna was rescued off the streets of New Jersey in November of 2012 and has been living at Bideawee ever since. Ms. Tuna enjoys being around people but prefers affection on her own terms. Once she's comfortable around you and in a relaxing environment, Ms. Tuna loves being scratched behind the ears. Ms. Tuna can be chatty as well and sure knows how to get what she wants. When its time for dinner, Ms. Tuna will come up to you giving the cutest little meow and begin doing figure eights around your feet. Ms. Tuna would prefer to go home with an experienced cat owner who understands and appreciates her independent nature. Ms. Tuna would also thrive in a calm and quiet atmosphere where there isnt a lot of hustle and bustle. Ms. Tuna would prefer to be the only cat although she may be able to live with another serene feline. To meet her, come to Bideawee!
name: Ms. Tuna

description: Bandit is a very brave Domestic short hair cat that survived breast cancer! Healthy, this quiet cutie is 4 years old and has a beautiful black and white coat with a distinctive cloudy eye. Bandit is very shy and fearful and she would need a patient, caring and experienced owner. We believe once she will feel safe and comfortable in her new home, shell be a wonderful companion! She can live in a household that has another friendly cat. Bandit lives with two friends now, Buddy and Jayne, and she is always happy to share her space with them. She used to live with her two kittens as well and took great care of them. Bandit is an ideal cat for somebody looking for a low-key cat to keep their resident cat company. Bandit wants nothing more than a warm home, a sunny spot, and a loving owner.
name: Bandit

description: Annette is a beautiful mature tuxedo kitty of 13 years old and she weighs 8 pounds. She is sweet and loving, and the wisdom of her years will make her forever grateful to the lucky family who takes her home! Annette is shy at first, but she wants nothing more than a gentle family to scratch her chin and let her lounge about, and occasionally bat at a toy. Due to her timidity, she will benefit from a family that has older children. Annette isnt clingy, and is laidback enough to entertain herself all day while youre at work!
name: Annette

description: Ashanti is a sublime and very bright 3 year old cat. He weighs 13 pounds and has an outgoing personality. Ashanti is curious but low key. This means that he likes to watch the world turn from a comfortable place, maybe a windowsill or a cabinet. Ashanti is shy in new environments and he has some fearfulness of hands. He would need further play therapy to get comfortable with his new person before allowing petting. Ashanti would prefer to be the center of your world and so we suggest he go home as the only pet. This sweetheart will do best with an experienced and gentle family that will give him the love he deserves. Come meet our fun-loving cat Ashanti!
name: Ashanti

description: Meet Sherrie! Sherrie is an eye-catching one year old Domestic Shorthair mix with the most fabulous calico coat! She also has bright amber eyes, a delicate pink nose, and a kind disposition! Sherrie came to Bideawee in May with her two friends: Tito and Luisa. Sherrie gets along with other cats and would be thrilled to come home to another calm and friendly feline. Sherrie also loves people and is quite affectionate. However, Sherrie is shy at first and it takes time before she is able to be comfortable in a new environment. Other cats help her come out of her shell and feel more at home in new places. Sherrie is also independent so shell be happy to lounge by herself while youre at work, as long as you promise her lots of cuddles when youre home. To meet beautiful Sherrie, come to Bideawee!
name: Sherrie

description: Willie is a stunning grey and white tabby who came to Bideawee in late January. Willie was rescued from an outdoor colony uptown. While Willie can be very shy at first, his true personality is loving and kind. Willie will snuggle up to those he trusts, hoping they give him attention and pets. When Willies very comfortable, hell even roll over and allow you to pet his belly. In return he promises little kisses to your fingers. Willie gets along fabulously with other cats and would be a wonderful companion if you have a kitty at home. Hes quite timid and would do best without very young children as they might make him nervous. If youve fallen head over heels for our loving Willie, come meet him today!
name: Willie

description: Watch My Video: https://youtu.be/vb8JHN0Xvqs Cricket is a gorgeous silver tabby of 5 years old who is looking for an experienced family who will love her quirky personality! Cricket is very talkative, chirping and crying to her human friends, and she always likes to be in the spotlight. But she likes affection to be on her own terms and she insists on being your only feline - other cats make her very cranky! Cricket came to Bideawee after her person had to go live in a hospice. This unique kitty will do best in a home where she is the only pampered pet!
name: Cricket

description: With her good looks and cheerful attitude, its no wonder this beauty was named Barbie! Barbie (formerly known as Barb) is nine months old and is as lovely as can be. Boasting a red coat with dainty white markings  shes about as beautiful as they come. But Barbie hopes you realize theres more to her than just dashing good looks. Barbie is a wonderfully happy and sweet dog. Despite her size (she already weighs 53 pounds), Barbie thinks shes a lap dog and is always up for a good snuggle. She is always thrilled to see one of her good friends and her whole body will wiggle with excitement as she watches them approach. Barbie is a little more nervous around new men and so she hopes theyll be patient with her as she comes out of her shell. Barbie has a lot of energy and is hoping for somebody who will help her exercise and explore the world around her. Long walks and trips to the park are ideal! Barbie is still working on her basic manners and is looking for an owner who will be consistent and focused with her so that she can ace her skills! Barbie gets along well with other playful dogs but a meet and greet is always recommended. Barbie prefers not to share her food and would do best in a home without young children. If this perfect pup speaks to you, adopt her today!
name: Barb

description: Affectionately named, this beautiful black cat is Big Foot. He earned his name thanks to his large polydactyl paws. In addition to his fabulous feet, Big Foot has the most expressive eyes weve ever seen. Large, amber, and full of emotion  his eyes will quickly let you know whether hes happy, nervous, or just relaxed. Big Foot is an entertaining and sweet cat, although hes very shy at first. In new environments or around new people, Big Foot can become timid and it will take him some time and gentle prodding to open up. But once he does, hes a true gem! Hell purr and push his head into your hand seeking out affection. Were sure in the right household, hell be a love-bug. Big Foot gets along incredibly well with other cats and has made quite a few friends here at Bideawee.
name: Big Foot

description: With his velvety grey and white coat and bubblegum pink nose, Marco is a picture perfect kitty! This handsome boy also happens to be the epitome of "cool." Hes a confident guy and adjusts well to new environments. Given some catnip and something to snack on, he quickly settles in to new areas. He loves to explore and you can often catch him gazing out the window and watching the world roll by. He really enjoys human attention and is a big fan of being pet, scratched, and just loved. While Marco loves people, he would probably do best living without very young children as he doesnt love being smooshed. If youve fallen head over heels for Marco, come meet him today!
name: Marco

description: Moustache here is a very appropriately named young cat. Moustache is an eleven month old black tuxedo with a striking white mustache. Despite Moustache's regal look, there's nothing haughty about cat. He is a lovable but timid boy. While it may take Moustache some time to come out of his shell and bond to you, once he bonds he bonds for life! After hes comfortable around you, hell purr leaning his whole body into yours, maybe even crawling youre your lap for a quick snooze. Moustache currently lives with other cats and he does fabulously in their presence. He's usually chasing them around the room or snuggled up to one of them during nap time. Moustaches best friend is Gigi and theyre very close. Bideawee is hoping that we can get them adopted together. Moustache is look for a quiet, gentle, and loving home with an experienced cat owner. Come meet him today!
name: Moustache

description: This beautiful girl is Gigi! Gigi is a six month old domestic shorthair mix with the most exquisite tabby coat. Swirling layers of brown and black with a dainty patches of white. Gigi is a shy cat but is quite loving once she gets to know you. While she might take a few minutes to warm up to being pet, if youre patient youre sure to get a purr and a head nod. Gigi adores other cats and is always snuggling with friends here at Bideawee. Gigi and her friend Moustache appear to be the most bonded and Bideawee is hoping to get them adopted together. If youre looking for a beautiful, sensitive, and charming young cat  come meet Gigi!
name: Gigi

description: Meet Lady! Lady is a four year old Domestic Shorthair mix with a unique look thatll stop you in your tracks. A beautiful calico coat and seafoam green eyes are the first thing youll notice about our dear Lady. But then youll quickly realize that this large lady, she weighs nine pounds, has a tremendous amount of love to give. She adores being pet, and will melt at the touch of your hand. Gently leaning her face into your palm so that you can scratch her behind the ears. A few strokes down her back and her lovely purr will begin to emanate. Lady also has a low-key and laid back energy level that makes her a great addition to a household where people work full time. If Lady sounds like the cat youre looking for, meet her today!
name: Lady

description: Absolutely stunning and with a personality to match, Gingas is one special kitty! Gingas is a one year old Domestic Shorthair mix who arrived at Bideawe with her mother Silamar. Gingas is a sweet, chatty, and loving young cat  although shes nervous when she first enters new environments. Her timidness quickly wares off, if you give her time and gentle encouragement. Once shes comfortable with you, shell seek out affection, rubbing against you for pets or purring it up by your side. Gingas gets along well with other kitties and even has a boyfriend here at Bideawee. Youll often catch her pal, Perrier grooming her and snuggling it up. Gingas is looking for a home that will understand her initial shyness and love her through it. Come meet Gingas today!
name: Gingas

description: Are you looking for that perfect blend of love and independence? Well then look no further than Raphael! Raphael is ten month old kitten who Bideawee pulled from a local municipal shelter. Raphael adores being around people and loves to snuggle. Youll often catch him sitting in someones lap and just being completely doted on. But dont think that this boy will be attached at your hip at all times. After hes been lavished with affection, hell happily play around for a bit  either chasing a mouse toy or a bouncing ball. Eventually hell make his way up to the window to watch the birds fly by and perhaps take a nap on his cat tree. You see, Raphael is a perfectly well-rounded cat! Raphael lives with other cats here at Bideawee but we think he would rather be your only and only in a house. If Raphael has stolen your heart, adopt him today!
name: Raphael

description: Have you been wishing for a fun, athletic, loving, and devoted dog to bring home? Someone who will join you on endless adventures? Greet you every day after work with a happy smile and big (slobbery) kiss? Well theres no need to wish, because Hope is ready for you! Hope is a year and a half old lady who came all the way from Georgia to meet her forever family. Her beauty is quick to catch your eye as she flaunts a tan coat with white markings and chocolate brown eyes. Despite weighing in at 43 pounds, Hope has no idea that shes a large dog. In fact, a lot of the time you see her shell be hugging a volunteer or snuggled in someones lap. Hope is quite affectionate and were sure whoever adopts will spend a lot of time cuddling with her. But like any young dog she needs her fair share of exercise! Hope really enjoys her walks outside and was a big fan of our recent snow fall. We can only imagine shell enjoy her future outdoor adventures as much. Hope is not yet housebroken and still needs to learn her basic manners. If you hope for Hope to be your future pup, come meet her today!
name: Hope

description: Meet Syrius! Syrius is a six year old Domestic Shorthair mix who came to Bideawee when his owner could no longer care for him. Syrius is an incredibly shy, albeit gentle cat. What really brings him the most joy is being around other cats. When he's in the presence of his feline friends you can feel his whole being begin to relax. And in fact, he doesn't even mind close quarters with his friends. He'll happily share a box or squeeze into a tiny cat bed - the more snuggles the better for him! While Syrius has always been timid here at Bideawee, perhaps in a calm and quiet home he'll be able to come out of his shell. What he's looking for is an experienced owner who has another cat. Someone who will give him the time, patience, and love to blossom into the cat we know he was meant to be. If you think you're this person, come meet Syrius today.
name: Syrius

description: This poor baby was found by a good semaritan with her two kittens and was taken in until her kittens were old enough. Her picture does not do her justice so please don't let that determine for you a meet and greet with Brie! Being on the street for who know how long, and with two kittens? Its hard enough living in NYC with no kittens but with two kittens? This beautiful soul of a cat is so precious. She is so loving when reaching to pet her she lifts her little head and pushes it gently as if she wants you to pet her and she is putting her trust in you. Please come in and meet her, show her your patience and give her your time. She will be the most loyal and best companion you will ever have! Come in and meet Brie today!
name: Brie

description: This regal kitty is Vivian! Vivian is a three year old Persian mix who arrived at Bideawee in late May. She has a luxuriously long apricot colored coat with the distinctly short Persian face. Vivian is a relaxed cat who enjoys spending her days relaxing in the sun or hiding out in a cozy nook. While Vivian is a lover at heart, she seems to prefer being around women. Vivian gets along well with other friendly felines, and she would be thrilled to go home to another cat. However, shell be just as happy relaxing in your home as long as you promise to give her all the love and attention that she deserves. Vivian would do great with an experienced cat owner who will give her the time and patience she needs to get used to her new surroundings. To meet Vivian, come to Bideawee!
name: Vivian

description: With her exotic coat and pale green eyes, its easy to see why people fall in love with Amana! Amana is a six year old Domestic Shorthair mix who came to Bideawee after her owners could no longer care for her. Amana is a special cat in need of a gentle and loving home. She can be quite loving once shes comfortable in her surroundings but she's very nervous in new places. She requires a patient owner who will help her feel at home in a new environment. Once Amana trusts you though theres no greater feeling. Shell snuggle up to you for attention. Either rubbing along your legs or curling up against your side. Amana lives with other cats here at Bideawee and may be able to go home to another friendly feline. If youre the perfect home for her, come meet Amana!
name: Amana

description: Handsome, refined, mature, and laid back  what more could you want in a companion! Tinker is a 15 year old Domestic Shorthair who was abandoned on the streets. Luckily, Bideawee swooped in and took this silver fox into our care. Tinker is a wonderful older gentleman but dont let his age fool you. He can still jump high and will happily find a perch so he can watch the birds outside the window. Hes also no crank and loves affection. Hell lean into pets, purring as loud as can be. Down the back or behind the ears, when you pet him hes happy. Tinker also has the cutest little meow youll ever hear. Once meal time rolls around, hes sure to make a little small talk before you sit down to eat. There is no love or gratitude greater than that of a senior pet. Consider bringing Tinker into your home today, we promise youll be the lucky one in the end.
name: Tinker

description: Say hello to Jimbo! Jimbo is a seven month old buff tabby with a personality that will leave you swooning. Jimbo is incredibly goofy and full of fun. Hes his happiest when hes chasing one of his many cat friends around or snuggling up by their side. Jimbo has lots of energy and so hes looking for a household thats excited about the prospect of a playful kitten. Jimbo is quite sweet once he gets to know you but can be a little reticent at first. His ideal home will give him the time he needs to come out of his shell. Once he knows hes safe, hell happily seek out affection, bumping up against your hand for some pets or swerving against your legs. Because Jimbo loves other cats so much, he needs to go home with his best pal Max, another friendly and sweet cat whom he has bonded with here. Adopt Jimbo today!
name: Jimbo

description: Meet Max! Max is an eight month old domestic Shorthair mix who came to Bideawee in late February with his brother Jimbo. Max is a unique looking fella who boasts an ebony coat and one enchanting amber eye. Max had to have his eye removed but is still a perfect kitty. He loves to play, jump, leap and soar. Max can be a little nervous when he meets new people but with a little patience he promises to be the sweetest companion in the world. He loves being pet and will roll over on his side as you begin to scratch him behind the head. At eight months old, hes full of energy and enthusiasm for life. Max loves other cats, in particular his fur friend Jimbo here whom he has bonded with, and so the two need to go home together. Adopt Max today!
name: Max

description: Give a warm welcome to Samantha! Samantha is a three year old love-bug who cannot wait to go home! She originally hails from Puerto Rico but it turns out that she loves the snow so perhaps she was always a New Yorker at heart. In addition to loving the snow, Samantha appears to love everything! She adores meeting new people and is always friendly and loving. Samantha gets along well with other dogs and has made quite a few canine friends here at Bideawee. But because of her size, she weighs 52 pounds, she should definitely meet any future fur siblings before she joins the household. Samanthas dream household would have loving, patient parents who will work with her to learn her basic manners (she loves to give hugs when she sees a friend). She would also love someone who will help her get the exercise a young dog like her needs to be healthy and happy. Samantha is hoping for an owner whose experienced with large breeds and will give her the time she needs to adjust once she leaves Bideawee. Samantha is housebroken although it may take her some time to get used to a new schedule. If Samantha is your dream pup, adopt her today!
name: Samantha

description: This handsome boy is Lucky. It sure was luck to have found such a sweet cat like Lucky. Lucky came to Bideawee in June and was found in Brooklyn. Lucky would like nothing more than to spend time with new people. Hes quite affectionate and enjoys head rubs. When hes feeling really comfortable, hell flop on his side and wait for some more attention. Lucky is an adult cat and would be okay during the day if his new home is busy. He could possibly live with another cat but a slow introduction is always recommended with any cat(s) at home. If he sounds like a catch, come meet him today!
name: Lucky
